text: Shiara Driesen (born 4 March 1991) is a Belgian korfball player. She is a member of Floriant and the Belgium national korfball team. With the national team she won the silver medal at the 2022 World Games in Birmingham, Alabama. ==Achievements== ===Club=== *Topkorfbal League champion, 2x (2017, 2022) *, champion, 2x (2015, 2016) *, champion, 2x (2019, 2022) *, 1x (2017) ===National team=== ; World Games : 2013 World Games : 2017 World Games : 2022 World Games ; IKF World Korfball Championship : 2015 IKF World Korfball Championship : 2019 IKF World Korfball Championship ; European Korfball Championship : 2014 IKF European Korfball Championship : 2016 IKF European Korfball Championship : 4th 2018 IKF European Korfball A-Championship : 2021 IKF European Korfball A-Championship ==References== Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:Belgian korfball players Category:Sportswomen
title: Shiara Driesen
